channel.title: Looking for something plz help!
channel.description: Hi im not so new just dont kno what im talking about half the time ok-so i relly need to know were a custom Sprites (HUD) kinda thing like backbace1 0 backbace2 0 chatback compas the works i remeber downlaoding a pack of them alreddy cut down to be put in (i kno might not make sence) just try and help :D

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for something plz help!
item.dc:creator: @Skelebob Skelebob
item.description:
@Skelebob wrote:

Uh, Looking at your help request, i think i kinda get what you mean.

You have some sprites and you don’t know where to add them?
If so, here is where you add them.

My client directory is
C:\Users*******\Desktop*****Scape

In that directory will be a folder named ‘Sprites’
C:\Users*******\Desktop*****Scape\Sprites

In that folder there will be names of files and .PNGs etc.
Just place your sprites their and it should work

Read full topic
